attributes.action: UK Government to protect the YPG against the Advancing Turkish troops in Afrin.
attributes.additional_details: The YPG have been helping coalition forces in there fight against ISIS and with out them ISIS would have taken over Syria and Iraq and now the sovrenty is at risk with the advancement of Turkish troops in afrin. so the question is will the UK government stand beside the YPG and at the least denounce the unprovoked attacks of the Turkish government and end the blood shed for the Civilans of Afrin
attributes.background: The YPG have been helping coalition forces in there fight against ISIS and with out them ISIS would have taken over Syria and Iraq and now the sovrenty is at risk with the advancement of turkish troops in Afrin. so the question is will the UK government stand beside the YPG.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
